jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Manage all District Marketing Managers in the respective area for coordinating, monitoring, planning and evaluating marketing strategies and plans to meet changing needs, market and competitive conditions in order to achieve its targets effectively
● Ensure products’ branding are created accordingly through activation in the respective region in order to create customer awareness
● Ensure a proper process for brand activation
● Ensure the marketing operations are conducted properly
● Maintain relationships with existing customers and partners in the respective areas
● Improve marketing process to reach maximum effectiveness and efficiency
● Evaluate and possess knowledge of competitive trends, market dynamics, forecasting for each market and total region to gather intelligence and insights in order to formulate and improve marketing strategy and plans.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• At least 7 years of working experience in marketing
  • Holds at least a Bachelor’s degree, preferably majoring in Marketing Management or Business from reputable university
  • Solid experience in handling ATL and BTL marketing
  • Good understanding of local knowledge
  • Willing to be relocated
  • Easily adapt to change, shows flexibility, prioritization, organisation and time management skills
  • Excellent communication skills with demonstrated interpersonal flexibility and strong team management skills
